definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Electrophoretic coating process on the aluminium alloy support used for solar energy heat unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了太陽能熱水器鋁合金托架的電泳塗漆工藝。

sentences.english: In combination with the above, solar evacuated tubes provide for the domestic hot water needs.
sentences.chinese: 結合上述，採用太陽能真空集熱管爲家裏提供熱水。

sentences.english: The paper applies microprocessor technology, designs the controller of return irrigation system of geothermal water.
sentences.chinese: 本文應用單片機技術，設計實現地熱水回灌控制器。

sentences.english: Lucilla:For now. first thing I shall do is have a hot bath.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我唯一想做的就是洗個熱水澡。

sentences.english: The designed descaling apparatus has been applied in geothermal system and good results have been achieved.
sentences.chinese: 所設計的除垢器已用於地熱水系統，防垢效果顯著。

sentences.english: The heat storage cement block is arranged underground a straw storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 儲熱水泥塊在存草倉的地下。

sentences.english: Hot-water hoses must be reinforced to withstand high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 熱水管必須能承受高溫。

sentences.english: Thermos bottles are very popular in China.
High-efficiency water heaters can drive down home energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 高效節能熱水器可以大大降低家庭能源費用。

sentences.english: I mix it with hot water like tea.
sentences.chinese: 用熱水沖泡，喝起來像茶。

sentences.english: The design of digital automatic temperature control water-heater is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了數字式自動控溫熱水器的設計思想。

sentences.english: The solution is to break up this insulating layer of hot water by agitation.
sentences.chinese: 方案是用攪拌的方法打破熱水構成的隔熱層。

sentences.english: She comforted her husband by putting his feet in a tub of hot water.
sentences.chinese: 她把丈夫的兩隻腳放在一桶熱水中使他舒服一些。

sentences.english: The unit shall be equipped with a standard 120V plug-in cord.
sentences.chinese: 這種熱水器應該配置一個標準的120伏插頭電纜。

sentences.english: Three fine streams of hot water spouted from holes in the radiator .
sentences.chinese: 三小股熱水從水箱外殼的洞裏湧出來。

sentences.english: To the hot water, add about one cup of baking soda for each gallon of water.
sentences.chinese: 在熱水中加入量爲每加侖水一茶杯的小蘇打。

definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
